verbose_text: We used the JNK inhibitor, SP600125, that was previously shown to selectively block JNK 1, 2, 3, and prevent c-Jun phosphorylation when injected into mice intraperitoneally (i.p) at a concentration of 16 mg/kg [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: JNK inhibitor, SP600125, that was previously shown to selectively block JNK 1, 2, 3, and prevent c-Jun phosphorylation
